item.title: Latexdiffcite
item.description: Setting up latexdiff for trackging changes with citations latexdiffcite is a python wrapper of latexdiff, which makes a track-change tex between given two tex documents taking changes in citations into account. Source https://github.com/twilsonco/latexdiffcite https://pypi.org/project/latexdiffcite/ Instalattion Since latexdiffcite is a simple wrapper of latexdiff, the prerequirement is of course latexdiff already installed. Upon that, the easiest way to install latexdiffcite is just using pip like: pip install latexdiffcite Usage If successfully installed, the one liner below immediately produces diff.

item.title: Style_changelog
item.description: 元祖 github-style からの変更履歴 アイコンを日替わりの identicon に設定 (6 March 2022) Publication への固定リンクをメニューに追加 (layout/partials/menu.html) (6 March 2022) ライトモード・ダークモードの切り替えトグルアイ
